Package adris.altoclef.tasks

Class ResourceTask

java.lang.Object
adris.altoclef.tasksystem.Task
adris.altoclef.tasks.ResourceTask
Direct Known Subclasses:
CarveThenCollectTask, CataloguedResourceTask, CollectAmethystBlockTask, CollectBlazeRodsTask, CollectBucketLiquidTask, CollectCoarseDirtTask, CollectCobbledDeepslateTask, CollectCobblestoneTask, CollectCocoaBeansTask, CollectCropTask, CollectDripstoneBlockTask, CollectEggsTask, CollectFlintTask, CollectGoldIngotTask, CollectGoldNuggetsTask, CollectHayBlockTask, CollectMagmaCreamTask, CollectMilkTask, CollectNetherBricksTask, CollectObsidianTask, CollectQuartzTask, CollectRedSandstoneTask, CollectSandstoneTask, CollectWheatSeedsTask, CollectWheatTask, CollectWoolTask, CraftInInventoryTask, CraftInTableTask, CraftWithMatchingMaterialsTask, KillAndLootTask, MineAndCollectTask, SmeltInFurnaceTask, TradeWithPiglinsTask, UpgradeInSmithingTableTask
public abstract class ResourceTask extends Task
The parent for all "collect an item" tasks. If the target item is on the ground or in a chest, will grab from those sources first.
